text: Ŵarabu ŵanchimisi ŵatite: “Tukulupilile.” Jilani (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ): “Nganinkulupilile. Nambo n’jileje: ‘Tulipeleeche (pakuŵa Asilamu).’ Ligongo mpaka sano chikulupi nganichijinjile m’mitima mwenu (ni kutamilichika). Sano naga nkunkunda Allah ni Ntenga Jwakwe ﷺ, ngampunguchisya chilichose mu (malipilo ga) itendo yenu. Chisimu Allah ni Jwakululuka kusyene, Jwachanasa channope.”
